biotools.summary:
We have compiled a new database regarding protein quality control in E. coli.
It is very exhaustive and integrates all experimental studies on chaperone interactions with protein solubility, abundance, folding, rna translation, protein structure, etc.

We are using it as a tool to discover new relations and regulatory motif in the data, but we would also like to share it with the community as an online database with a very simple functionality:
once the user specifies a set of E. coli proteins, the site returns all the features in which that set of protein differs from the background.

bioschemas.name: Protein Homeostasis Database
bioschemas.summary:
We have compiled a new database regarding protein quality control in E. coli.

once the user specifies a set of E. coli proteins, the site returns all the features in which that set of protein differs from the background.
